title: Just-Ask.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Just-Ask capability, allowing free-form questions or requests.

profile.description: Optional reference to the subject or agent profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

query.description: Free-form question, request, or instruction from the caller.

context.description: Optional contextual hints provided by the caller.

caller.description: Identifier of the requesting agent or subscriber.
